title: Venezuela Inflation Rate MoM
description: The Consumer Price Index in Venezuela increased 6.20 percent in October of 2022 over the previous month. Inflation Rate MoM in Venezuela averaged 17.30 percent from 2008 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 196.60 percent in January of 2019 and a record low of 0.80 percent in April of 2012. Inflation Rate MoM measures month over month change in the price of goods and services. This page provides - Venezuela Inflation Rate MoM - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Banco Central De Venezuela
